clinical_study.brief_title: Overnight Fasting After Completion of Therapy
clinical_study.official_title: Overnight Fasting After Completion of Therapy: The OnFACT Study

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to test whether regular not eating for at least 12 hours ("overnight fasting") can improve blood sugar and the health of the GI tract.
There are 2 parts to this study: Part 1 will last for 1-2 weeks and will determine whether the patient can participate in Part 2. If they complete Part 1 they are eligible to participate in Part 2, they will sign a separate consent form for Part 2. Part 2 of this study will last 6 months.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: The OnFACT study is a single-arm trial of prolonged overnight fasting among 50 overweight or obese adult survivors of childhood cancer followed in the Memorial Sloan Kettering Adult Long Term Follow Up Program.

primary_outcome.description: Assess the effect of prolonged overnight fasting on glucose metabolism, measured by glycosylated hemoglobin (HbA1c).

arm_group.description: The purpose of the intervention is to increase the nightly fasting duration to a minimum of 12 hours. Adherence to the intervention will be measured by the proportion of SMS text message-days reflecting 12 or more hours of fasting. The intervention protocol follows an approach using strategies outlined by social cognitive theory that focus on (a) goal setting and (b) building self-efficacy.

intervention.description: Adherence to fasting will be estimated by proportion of the 49 nights (7 weeks) with ≥12 hours of fasting as per text message data from the participant. If the participant neglects to text the fasting duration, that night will be considered not adherent (a conservative adherence estimate).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Body mass index is ≥ 25kg/m^2
- History of treatment for cancer or related illness diagnosed at ≤ 25 years old
- Off of all cancer therapy for ≥ 2 years
- Current age ≥ 18 years
- English-speaking
- Personal phone with SMS text messaging capability
Exclusion Criteria:
- Use of any antidiabetic, weight loss, or appetite control medication
- Use of any other medication that could impact dietary intake, such as prednisone
- Currently fasts 12 hours or more (on either of two 24 hour diet recalls, conducted during Interim 1)
- Unable to fast due to medical reason such as pregnancy
